distances.secondary

Class MutualProximityCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • distances.primary.CombinedMetric
      • distances.secondary.MutualProximityCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MutualProximityCalculator
extends CombinedMetric
implements java.io.Serializable
    This classs implements the mutual proximity similarity measure. The basic formula determines the probability that x is a neighbor of y and y is a neighbor of x. This class methods actually return 1 - MP, as distance matrices are the default (and not similarity matrices) throughout the code. The details of the procedure can be found in the following research paper: "Using Mutual Proximity to Improve Content-Based Audio Similarity" that was published in 2011 by Dominik Schnitzer, Arthur Flexer, Markus Schedl and Gerhard Widmer.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • calculateSecondaryDistMatrixMultThr

        public float[][] calculateSecondaryDistMatrixMultThr(NeighborSetFinder nsf,
                                            int numThreads)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculate the secondary distance matrix on the data in a multi-threaded way.
        Parameters:
        nsf - NeighborSetFinder object.
        numThreads - Number of threads to use.
        Returns:
        float[][] representing the upper triangular secondary MP distance matrix.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • calculateSecondaryDistMatrixMultThrFast

        public float[][] calculateSecondaryDistMatrixMultThrFast(int numThreads,
                                                int samplingSize)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculate the secondary distance matrix on the data in a multi-threaded way, with sampling for speed-up.
        Parameters:
        numThreads - Integer that is the number of threads to use.
        samplingSize - Integer that is the size of the sample.
        Returns:
        float[][] representing the upper triangular secondary MP distance matrix.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Returns:
        The secondary distance matrix.

        public float dist(DataInstance firstInstance,
         DataInstance secondInstance,

        Calculates the distance based on mutual proximity.
        Parameters:
        firstInstance - First DataInstance.
        secondInstance - Second DataInstance.
        distsFirst - Distances from the first point to other points in the data, used to build a distance model.
        distsSecond - Distances from the second point to other points in the data, used to build a distance model.
        Returns:
        Float value that is the distance based on mutual proximity.

        java.lang.Exception
